title: Paying Off Debt & Mental Health w/ Melanie Lockert
itunes:title: Paying Off Debt & Mental Health w/ Melanie Lockert
description:
Money and mental health are certainly in the top tier category of 'what not to talk about at a party', however we believe debt payoff and our mental wellbeing go hand in hand and we need to find places of safety to talk about these topics! Melanie joins us to share her own journey with mental health during her debt payoff and how this has looked for her even beyond debt freedom.

Get full show notes here!

  • Get our FREE 7-Day No-Spend Challenge Workbook here! https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/free 
  • Join the waitlist for Club BFF: https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/club-bff-waitlist/ 
  • Subscribe for more on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/frugalfriends 
  • Hang out with us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/frugalfriendspodcast/ 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
